properties.areaDesc: Huron Islands to Marquette MI; Munising to Grand Marais MI; Grand Marais to Whitefish Point MI; Marquette to Munising MI
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued January 6 at 4:26PM EST until January 8 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or
greater expected, and may rapidly accumulate on vessels. West
winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves 7 to 10
feet occurring.

* WHERE...Huron Islands to Marquette MI, Marquette to Munising
MI, Munising to Grand Marais MI and Grand Marais to Whitefish
Point MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 7 PM Tuesday
to 10 AM EST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 11
AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of stability.
Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST TUESDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY
